extendedInfo.description: NEW: ONE OF THE TOP IPHONE APP NOW ON ANDROID! PRESS QUOTE:Text'nDrive will "appeal to business types who frequently find themselves whizzing down life's freeways with an urgent email to send or receive." - Kit Eaton, Fast Company Keep your hands on the wheel and eyes on the road with this innovative technology. One of the 30 Best iPhone Apps according to TechCrunch!This app allows you to be a responsible driver and stay connected by reading unlimited messages and reply by voice. â Launch Offer â 50% OFF â  "it's worth every penny you pay for it, and more." - Steve Sande, TUAW FEATURES:â Reads emails and SMS out loudâ Text-to-speech technology â No typing requiredâ Tested on Gmail, Me, Yahoo, Hotmail, AOL & compatible with most mail providersâ Works with any hands-free devices such as speakerphones, Bluetooth headsets or built-in car systems. (Android 2.2+)â Pro version: Reply with your voice, reads 10 times more words, multiple email accounts and much more... Buy it today 50% OFF BENEFITS: â Maintain road safety while staying productive â Be compliant with local legislation on mobile use while driving â Lessen accidents caused by texting or emailing while operating a motor vehicle â Save on insurance premiums by helping maintain an accident free record â Diminish the risk of injury or death caused by distracted driving Eliminate the temptation of reading your emails and SMS while driving by listening to a voice that reads your emails and SMS in real time and reply by Voice. Drive Safely by Texting while driving without looking at your phone!!TESTIMONIALS: "This app is brilliant and could be a real life saver. I confess I am always tempted to check my emails when I'm driving and I almost had an accident 2 weeks ago because of that. Since I installed Text'nDrive App, no more typing while driving... a nice lady voice reads me emails directly on my Bluetooth handset and I can focus on the road without having to touch my phone. I will probably upgrade to the pro version to be able to reply to my emails with my voice. GREAT APP! I highly recomment it for anyone who does not have it yet." - Claire Rodriguez "I was a bit skeptical at first but this app works out well. Will give it a few more runs but I think I'll upgrade to the pro version soon. Very satisfied." - Carl Devine Text'nDrive supports all Yahoo accounts with POP access including ymail and Yahoo Plus, and most regular Yahoo email accounts. Some older Yahoo email accounts do not have the option to enable a POP account. TextânDrive works with Exchange only if the IMAP protocol is enable for your email account. If youâre not sure please ask your IT support to enable it for you and ask them the incoming and outgoing server to use with the corresponding ports. ________________________________________ The Text'nDrive team is dedicated to responsive development and support. If you have questions or criticism please send us a note at support@textndrive.com. We may be able to fix your issues in less time than it would take to write a negative review. We are very attentive to your feedback/suggestions/comments. Your input will allow us to further enhance and develop new features for the Text'nDrive App.DriveSafely today download TextandDrive now.

reviews.comment: This application does not work the way it shows on the video demonstration\tHorrible app my advice do not download the free app or purchase it! Text n drive when purchased when  you get a message it reads out loud and when you want to reply it sends as voice message and does not work properly. When you send a text it does not send as a written text only voice so keep in mind and makes your phone crash and act up. Horrible app do not download.
reviews.author: s s

reviews.title: Not 100%
reviews.comment: Great app, but not 100%.  Turns on in the middle of the night.  Won\'t respond to sending hands free text back.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What the!
reviews.comment: I have never seen such a lame app! First off you cannot really send a message, only respond to one.I purchased this last night to see how the pro work and deleted it within 10 minutes but I received the receipt this morning that I had purchased it. Now it keeps telling me to upgrade which is something like $10 per year.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thunderbolt htc Not Happy
reviews.comment: I have had this app since 2011..  I paid 19.95..  It has never worked like it says..  I keep trying over the couple years nothing has changed.  It doesn\'t work period...  Keep hoping they fix the issues..  Wish I would have read comments first..  Not happy but I do keep trying  since I paid for it to work..
reviews.author: Johanna Lord

reviews.comment: Was great for about 20 mins then it wouldn\'t let me use any other app on my phone. By then it was to late to refund.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Did not up grade
reviews.comment: I have used the program for months. I quickly purchased the upgrade. No changes were made. I have uninstalled and uninstalled the program. There is still no change. I have to reenter my email account information each time I start the program. Audio response does not work well.  I uninstall the program.  I got a new phone and reinstall the program. I still have to re enter my email address every time I open it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Horrible app
reviews.comment: Conflicted with my dock app software. Hijacked control of the screen. I uninstalled it and within a day and it will not refund my purchase. Horrible DON\'T BUY!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Textndrive
reviews.comment: Not working very easy.  Took over my phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just Ok  Forget The Hype
reviews.comment: I was disappointed after trying the free version which seemed to have much promise.  Responsiveness to voice prompts was slow.  Don\'t waste your $.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wait for this technology to be better
reviews.comment: Don\'t waste your money. App read txts but volume is too low. App has to be on the screen for you to reply- making it NOT handsfree.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Kill that video guy
reviews.comment: Doesnt work waste of time and money no stars
reviews.author: David Stewart

reviews.title: Do not buy
reviews.comment: Don\'t waste your money on this horrendous application that doesn\'t work.  Support doesn\'t respond to queries.  Application doesn\'t do what is advertised on several different handset\'s.. So can\'t blame the device.  Finally, don\'t waste your money. Seriously don\'t waste it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: I have tried this quit a few times ..but did not do what it says at all sorry i paid for it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t waste your time.
reviews.comment: very disappointed. I wish I could get my money back.
reviews.author: Andre Watson

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Worse app ever!  Waste of money
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It works fine
reviews.comment: The problem is how do you get it to turn off? who needs to be a better tutorial for this product.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Frustrated
reviews.comment: A promising app but using tect n drive pro on an adroid I am constantly re entering my email config.  Also nit happy with the rinky dinky tech support  I wpuld not buy this again until thys get it together
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Text \'ndrive
reviews.comment: Absolutely love it, l recommend this app to anyone that has tried to text while driving.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bomber
reviews.comment: I thought this app was going to be a winner but instead of doing all it showed on the youtube it was nothing but, I spend money for something that was buggy and drain my batterie and never assit me so do not buy this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Text drive
reviews.comment: Does not work right
